channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Best Contact Management Software for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2022-2151|2024-08-03T00:24:44.266Z -- unknown -- best%20contact%20management%20software%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The Best Contact Management Software WordPress plugin through 3.7.3 does not sanitise and escape its settings, allowing high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
